Example Note
============

If you would like to teach an important concept, you can do so as a note.

These notes are written as reStructuredText files.

.. _subsection_1_link:

Subsection 1
^^^^^^^^^^^^
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Maecenas ultricies mi eget mauris.

.. _subsection_2_link:

Subsection 2
^^^^^^^^^^^^
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Maecenas ultricies mi eget mauris.
